item.title: hdu 3415 Max Sum of Max-K-sub-sequence (单调队列)

item.title: ural 1126. Magnetic Storms (单调队列模板题)
item.description: ural 1126 题意：n个数，求从第k个元素开始，求每k个元素的最大值（一共求n-k+1次） 思路：单调队列。 单调队列学习链接 其实单调队列挺容易的理解的。

item.title: poj 2823 Sliding Window (单调队列)
item.description: Sliding Window **Time Limit:** 12000MS **Memory Limit:** 65536K **Total Submissions:** 46705 **Accepted:** 13485 **Case Time Limit:** 5000MS Description An array of size _n_ ≤ 106 is given to you. There is a sliding window of size _k_ which is moving from the very left of the array to the very right. You can only see the _k_ numbers in the window. Each time the sliding window moves rightwards by one
